channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 6f4fe6fc-f04f-4d97-8528-8bc18c848dca
Display name: Container Apps ConnectedEnvironments Contributor
Description: Full management of Container Apps ConnectedEnvironments, including creation, deletion, and updates.
Link: https://management.azure.com/6f4fe6fc-f04f-4d97-8528-8bc18c848dca?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: ff478a4e-8633-416e-91bc-ec33ce7c9516
Display name: Azure Messaging Connectors Owner
Description: Allows for full access to Azure Messaging Connectors resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/ff478a4e-8633-416e-91bc-ec33ce7c9516?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 3bc748fc-213d-45c1-8d91-9da5725539b9
Display name: Container Registry Contributor and Data Access Configuration Administrator
Description: Provides permissions to create, list, and update container registries and registry configuration properties. Provides permissions to configure data access such as admin user credentials, scope maps, and tokens, which can be used to read, write or delete repositories and images. Does not provide direct permissions to read, list, or write registry contents including repositories and images. Does not provide permissions to modify data plane content such as imports, Artifact Cache or Sync, and Transfer Pipelines. Does not provide permissions for managing Tasks.
Link: https://management.azure.com/3bc748fc-213d-45c1-8d91-9da5725539b9?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 566f0da3-e2a5-4393-9089-763f8bab8fb6
Display name: Health Safeguards Data User
Description: Allows processing of health data in all available Health Safeguards
Link: https://management.azure.com/566f0da3-e2a5-4393-9089-763f8bab8fb6?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7fd69092-c9bc-4b59-9e2e-bca63317e147
Display name: App Configuration Data SAS User
Description: Allows the usage of SAS tokens for authentication.
Link: https://management.azure.com/7fd69092-c9bc-4b59-9e2e-bca63317e147?api-version=2022-04-01
